page.title: 03Employment At Sealand.
page.content: For many years unemployment was a word that was new to our area.But in the late 1970's British Steel Corporation at Shotton less than a mile away reduced its work force from around 12,000 to 3,000.This caused a lot of unemployment in this area,as some three quarters of the population had some connection with the works.Now with nearly twenty per cent of the population on the dole great efforts are being made to bring new industry to our area.Many firms are coming to the new Deeside Industrial Park,but only a few people are able to find employment there.
